member.name: subject
member.doc: User friendly name of the subject that is associated with the location. Can be a person, e.g. Albert, or a place, e.g. Home, or ...

member.name: latitude
member.doc: The longitude of the subject's location using the "signed decimal degrees" standard.

member.name: longitude
member.doc: The longitude of the subject's location using the "signed decimal degrees" standard.
